definitions: in a way that is firmly fixed and not likely to give way or overturn

examples.text: the plastic parts are fixed stably on the metal surface

shortDefinitions: in way that is firmly fixed

definitions: in a way that is not likely to change or fail

examples.text: there is a need to develop combustion systems that can operate stably and efficiently at low power conditions

shortDefinitions: in way that is not likely to change or fail
